question: What significant historical status was granted to Jihlava, Czech Republic in 1982?
true_answer: It was declared an urban monument reservation.
asked_question_translated: Koks svarbus istorinis statusas 1982 m. buvo suteiktas Jihlavai (Čekija)?
answer: 1982 m. Jihlava (Čekija) gavo istorinio miesto statusą.
answer_translated_eng: Jihlava (Czech Republic) was granted the status of a historic city in 1982.
